subject: Re: Gateway MT6451
body:
Looks like you found the HDA driver for sound.
I think that, but my sound still "mute" ... I checked  the mixers and they are not in mute...
For the SD/MMC driver for the TI PCIxx12 you may get luck using thenewest drivers from here:
http://developer.berlios.de/projects/tifmxx
Ok! i will try those drivers, tnaks for your tip! 
 I'm afraid someone else will need to explain to you how to get theBroadcom 1390 WLAN working under Linux.  Good luck!


I will try the ndiswrapper as  Celejar said me... 

Thanks! a lot Friends!
